title: Back and Forth Battle!
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>As I said, no matter how many times you tell me that, my answer is still no.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I definitely think it would look good on you, though.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>On me!? This thing!? I can’t possibly wear a short, tight, and sexy skirt like this!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>My, that’s not true. You have a dignified and beautiful posture because of your archery practice. Plus, you also have these slender hands and feet.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>HIIEEEH! ....Please don’t touch me like that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Oh my, I was just stroking you a little bit, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Uuu.... Anyway! I’m not wearing it! Why can’t you just wear it, Karin?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>....I see. It’s embarrassing to wear it alone, huh? You should’ve told that earlier. Then, let’s wear matching ones♪ Do you want the red one or the black one?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Red or black.... Wait! That’s not what I meant!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Come on. If you don’t choose quickly, I’m going to choose for you, alright~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
